title: Design user interface mockups
description: Create comprehensive UI mockups for all main application screens including responsive layouts and user interaction flows.

title: Implement authentication system
description: Develop secure user authentication including login, registration, password reset, and session management.

title: Content strategy planning
description: Define content architecture, tone of voice, and create editorial calendar for website launch.

title: Homepage layout design
description: Design an engaging homepage layout that effectively communicates the brand message and drives user engagement.

title: Requirements gathering
description: Collect and document detailed functional and technical requirements from stakeholders.

title: Database schema design
description: Design optimized database schema with proper indexing and relationships for the analytics platform.

title: Chart component development
description: Build interactive chart components for data visualization including line charts, bar charts, and pie charts.

title: Security compliance review
description: Conduct comprehensive security audit and ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
